title: 3DSceneLayerInfo
description: The object 3DSceneLayerInfo describes the properties of a layer in a store. Every scene layer contains 3DSceneLayerInfo. For features based scene layers, such as 3D objects or point scene layers, may include the default symbology, as specified in the [drawingInfo](drawingInfo.md), which contains stylization information for a feature layer.

id.description: Unique numeric ID of the layer.

href.description: The relative URL to the 3DSceneLayerResource. Only present as part of the SceneServiceInfo resource.

spatialReference.description: The spatialReference of the layer including the vertical coordinate system. WKT is included to support custom spatial references.

heightModelInfo.description: Enables consuming clients to quickly determine whether this layer is compatible (with respect to its horizontal and vertical CRS) with existing content.

version.description: The ID of the last update session in which any resource belonging to this layer has been updated.

alias.description: The display alias to be used for this layer.

copyrightText.description: Copyright and usage information for the data in this layer.

items.description: Describes the capabilities of the scene layer.

ZFactor.description: should we not document this or is it still needed?

cachedDrawingInfo.description: Indicates if any stylization information represented as drawingInfo is captured as part of the binary mesh representation.  This helps provide optimal client-side access. Currently the color component of the drawingInfo is supported.

elevationInfo.description: An object containing elevation drawing information. If absent, any content of the scene layer is drawn at its z coordinate.

disablePopup.description: Indicates if client application will show the popup information.

store.description: The store object describes the exact physical storage of a layer and enables the client to detect when multiple layers are served from the same store.

fields.description: A collection of objects that describe each attribute field regarding its field name, datatype, and a user friendly name {name,type,alias}. It includes all fields that are included as part of the I3S layer as derived from a source input feature layer.

attributeStorageInfo.description: Provides the schema and layout used for storing attribute content in binary format in I3S.

statisticsInfo.description: Contains the statistical information for a layer.
